_sText:
Zm_fortress_b3 Changelog
(newer version of zm_ZFC_b2)
=====================
Created by [#OMEGA] - K2
=====================
This is my first offical multiplayer map; I deceided to create a zombie mod because zombie mod owns. Orginally it was crated for a clan out of a HLÂ² Map (which was created just for SP ^^), but this clan kicked me so I won't work for the clan anymore. This map is independent now ^^
=====================
Map Information:

This is somekind of a fortress build by humans and overtaken by the combines during the war. Now it is abonded and the combine and thair human slaves disappeared without a trace. Blood and somekind of "Headcrabs" were found here; according to roumors zombies were seen in the fortress...
Now it's about you to find out what really happened here... 
---> Good Luck soldier! 

=====================
Version Info:

Version: Beta 3 
Released: 06.01.2007 (Febuary)
Spawnpoints: 32 T, 32 CT (64) 
Notes: NO HDR, not all rooms finished yet, Decals missing
Compiling Time: 	vbsp.exe 13 sec. 
			vvis.exe 13 min. 16 sec.
			vrad.exe 9 min. 21.sec
Total: 22min. 50 sec

=====================
Contact @ (no spam)

E-Mail: omegak2@gmx.de
ICQ: 192-355-651
MSN: omegak2@hotmail.de

or Visit my Clan hompage @ www.team-PoA.de.vu

=====================================================================
Changelog:

-new physic props were added in the "old room" (4 Chairs)
-added a clip texture in the storage with the vent; you can't fall behind the container anymore
-changed the maxfadedist of some props in the "old room"
-added a clip texuter to the winerack in the "old room"
-changed the model of the rook outside (near the biggest tree)
-changed the width of the windows
-changed the trigger_push near the secret vent room
-replaced the ZFC logo with omega k2 logo
-increased the damage of the doors of the secret room
-added a windows in the door (upstairs) of the secret room
-removed some clip texutes belonging to the ladders
-made a camp spot worser
-added another roof and a clip texture to prevent bug abusing
-added some new (small) buildings and barriers
-added new railing near ct spawn
-changed textures and with of the blocks near ct spawn
-added lights and props belonging to the lights
-added a clip texture near the room with the weapons; you can't get on the other clip texture now
-completed the "ventroom"; added buttons to open the vents too
-replaced some unnecessary textures with noclip
-fixed some faces of the weaponracks
-added a new camp spot above the weaponracks
-changed the big tree's rotation
-finished the kitchen
-increased the End Fade Dist of some props
-finished the bathroom
-increased the length of a wall in the computer room
-used more vertexes
-finished the supervison room
-increased the mass of the spoolwires
-chenged the postion of some secret buttons a bit
-moved the car a bit back

=====================================================================
Planned for new Versions:

-cubemaps
-all Rooms
-some more props
-all props (even the light props) with a End Fade Dist
-different Button position (secret buttons)
-decals
-scoundscape / some scary sounds
-bugfixes (If I find some or someone report bugs)
-balancing 
-(HDRR)
-Area Portals

=====================================================================
Zip-File should contain:

zm_fortress_b3.bsp 5.431.564 Bytes
zm_fortress_b3.nav 333.938 Bytes
zm_fortress_b3.txt 1.290 Bytes
zm_fortress_b3 - changelog - information.txt

If one of these files is missing please redownload the zip; I offically uploaded them on fpsbanana and the zombiemod website.

(copied form the zm_fortress_b3 - changelog - information.txt file, please report every bug you find and post your suggestions ^^)

EDIT: Please get zm_fortress_b4 instead of _b3! - http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/21496
